Core Features

Everything you need to create, analyze, and monetize

Live

Channel Ideas Generator

AI-powered niche discovery with complete monetization blueprints. Get 10 profitable channel ideas in seconds.

Live

Trend Detector

Spot viral topics 48 hours before they peak. Real-time trend analysis across all major platforms.

Live

Content Pack Generator

Generate complete content packs with AI scripts, SOPs, image prompts, and research keywords.

Live

YouTube Analytics

Deep insights into your channel performance, audience behavior, and retention metrics.

Live

Income Tracker

Monitor all revenue streams - affiliate earnings, sponsorships, ad revenue, and more.

Live

Saved Ideas Library

Organize and save your best ideas. Never lose a great content concept again.

Coming Soon

Audience Insight Engine

Analyze real audience comments to discover what your audience actually wants. Evidence-based content ideas from Instagram, YouTube, and competitor channels.

Coming Soon

AI Audiobook Studio

Convert written content into professional audiobook videos automatically. Background rendering with preset editing styles.

Coming Soon

Textography Reels Generator

Create engaging text-based Instagram Reels in under 2 minutes. No face, no voice, just viral content with animated text and music.

Coming Soon

Snap Clipper

Extract best moments from long videos into viral short clips automatically. AI-powered moment detection with vertical format conversion.

Coming Soon

Content Lifespan Optimizer

Transform one content idea into multiple platform-specific formats. Maximize reach by repurposing across all platforms.

Coming Soon

Hook Effectiveness Tester

Score your content hooks before posting. Get AI-powered improvement suggestions based on curiosity, clarity, and emotional pull.

Coming Soon

Creator Consistency Tracker

Track creative momentum and prevent burnout. Monitor streaks, active days, and consistency scores with gentle, supportive insights.

How It Works

Your path to creator success in 4 simple steps

1

Discover Your Niche

Use AI to find profitable niches with low competition and high monetization potential.

2

Spot Trends Early

Get real-time alerts on trending topics before they go viral. Stay ahead of the curve.

3

Generate Content

Create complete content packs with scripts, SOPs, and research in minutes.

4

Track & Optimize

Monitor performance, analyze what works, and scale your winning content.
